title: First Ride Review: Vittoria Syerra Downcountry Tire is a good upgrade for aggressive XC
content:
Vittoria Tires have released an new mountain bike tire specifically for Downcountry riding; the Vittoria Syerra. A supple yet robust casing construction is combined with a fast-rolling tread pattern made up of their proven 4C Graphene-containing rubber compounds. author: Jessie-May Morgan
